Arrangement.text:
VERSE 1: Lord I [A]come, [Dsus2]I con[A]fess [E4/G#]Bowing [F#m7]here [E/G#] I find my [Dadd9]rest Without [A]You, [Dsus2]I fall [A]apart You're the [A]one [E/G#] that guides my[Dadd9] heart [Dadd9]
CHORUS1: Lord, I [A]need You, [Dsus2]oh I [A]need [E/G#]You [F#m7]Every [Dsus2]hour I [A]need [E/G#]You My [A5/C#]one [A5/D]defense, my [A]righteous[Dsus2]ness Oh [A]God, how I [E/G#]need [A]You [Dsus2]
VERSE 2: Where sin runs [A]deep, Your [Dsus2]grace is [A]more Where grace is [F#m7]found is [E4/G#]where You [Dadd9]are And where You [A]are Lord [Dsus2]I am [A]free Holi[E4/G#]ness [E/G#] is Christ in m[A]e [Dsus2]
BRIDGE: So [A5/D]teach my [A5/C#]song to [E5/G#]rise to [F#m7]You When temptation [E/G#]comes my [Dadd9]way And when I [A5/D]cannot [A5/C#]stand I'll [E5/G#]fall on [F#m7]You Jesus You're my [E/G#]hope and [A]stay [Dsus2]
Outro: You are my [A5/C#]one [A5/D]defense, my [A]righteous[Dsus2]ness Oh [A]God, how I [E/G#]need [A]You My [A5/C#]one [A5/D]defense, my [A]righteous[Dsus2]ness Oh [A]God, how I [E/G#]need [A]You
Arrangement.searchtext: verse 1 lord i come i confess bowing here i find my rest without you i fall apart youre the one that guides my heart chorus1 lord i need you oh i need you every hour i need you my one defense my righteousness oh god how i need you verse 2 where sin runs deep your grace is more where grace is found is where you are and where you are lord i am free holiness is christ in me bridge so teach my song to rise to you when temptation comes my way and when i cannot stand ill fall on you jesus youre my hope and stay outro you are my one defense my righteousness oh god how i need you my one defense my righteousness oh god how i need you

VERSE 2: Where sin runs [A]deep, Your [D2]grace is [A]more Where [E/G#]grace is [F#m7]found is [E]where You [D2]are And where You [A]are Lord [D2]I am [A]free Holi[A/E]ness [E] is Christ in m[D2]e [D2]
BRIDGE: So [D]teach my [A/C#]song to [E/B]rise to [F#m7]You [D]When temptation [E]comes my [D2]way And when I [D]cannot [A/C#]stand I'll [E/B]fall on [F#m7]You [D]Jesus You're my [E]hope and [A]stay [D2]
Outro: You are my [A/C#]one [D2add6]defense, my [A/E]righteous[D/F#]ness Oh [A/E]God, how I [E]need [A]You You are my [A/C#]one [D2add6]defense, my [A/E]righteous[D/F#]ness Oh [A/E]God, how I [E]need [A]You
